name: Golf With Guns (Nothing)
description:
So I added guns to golf. Play through a golf course with a gun as your club of choice. Watch out! Monsters are ready to ruin your day of relaxation.

Controls:
WASD - Move
SPACE - Shoot
TAB - Settings/Options menu

Credits:
Bix Men - Code and Art
I have free games like this on my itch page!
https://nothing-d.itch.io/

Info:
Made for Mini-Jam 93 with the theme of 'Vacation' and the limitation of 'Indirect Control'
Started: Friday, November 12th, 2021 8:00pm
Finished: Friday, November 14th, 2021 8:00pm
Engine: Godot 3.4
